nodes.text: Vil Burren was a Zabrak female who died in 1 ABY during an outbreak of the Blackwing virus on Dathomir. After her death, her undead body was controlled by the virus and kept wandering around in the Quarantine Zone until it was destroyed by a spacer.

Vil Burren is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and was added to the game as part of the "Death Troopers" update in October 2009. She is one of the Undead boss enemies in the Quarantine Zone that players have to kill to complete a collection.
